Parameters: int: The position of first item that has changed.
int: The count of how many items have changed.
notifyArrayItemRangeChanged(int, int).Description: Notify that the content of a range of items changed. Note that this is not same as items being added or removed.

lookup(int).Description: Returns the object for the given key, or null if no mapping for that key exists.

size().Description: Returns the number of items in the adapter.

Parameters: int: The key associated with the item.
Object: The item associated with the key.
set(int, java.lang.Object).Description: Sets the item for the given key.

Parameters: int: The key to be cleared.
clear(int).Description: Clears the given key and associated item from the adapter.

clear().Description: Removes all items from this adapter, leaving it empty.

Returns: Index of the item, or a negative value if not found.
Parameters: Object: The item to find in the array.
indexOf(java.lang.Object).Description: Returns the index for the given item in the adapter.

Returns: Index of the item, or a negative value if not found.
Parameters: int: The key to find in the array.
indexOf(int).Description: Returns the index for the given key in the adapter.

isImmediateNotifySupported().Description: Returns true if the adapter pairs each underlying data change with a call to notify and false otherwise.

get(int).Description: Returns the item for the given position.

ClassDesc: An @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ObjectAdapter_E@ implemented with a https:##developer#android#com@B_android#util#SparseArray_E@. This class maintains an array of objects where each object is associated with an integer key which determines its order relative to other objects.
